I hope that Republicans and Democrats can come together in good faith over the coming weeks, before President Trump illegally declares a national emergency at the southern border. I am ready to come to the table and fight for solutions that reflect our values as Americans.

And over the past month, we’ve witnessed this President treat these hardworking federal employees like collateral damage in his quest to fulfill a ludicrous campaign promise.  It was wrong, it was dangerous, and it was inexcusable.

Read my full statement: https://www.menendez.senate.gov/news-and-events/press/menendez-statement-on-deal-to-open-the-federal-government-for-three-weeks- …

We’ve shared the stories of unpaid federal workers—TSA agents, air traffic controllers, EPA and IRS workers, Coast Guardsmen and women and so many more—some visiting food banks, worried about losing their homes and struggling to pay their bills.

For weeks, my Democratic colleagues and I have been *crystal* clear that if Trump wants to have a debate about border security & immigration reform, he must open the government & release the 800K hostages he’s held captive over a border wall he promised Mexico would pay for.

For the thousands of federal workers & their families who’ve been struggling, hurting & facing more pain, it seems as though their nightmare is over—for now.

But my God, this never should have happened, it never should have gone on so long, & it never EVER should happen again.

You can’t make this stuff up—even a @FoxNews poll reported that most Americans would not be able to pay their bills after 2 missed paychecks.

Mr. President, your shutdown is disgraceful. Open the government and then we can talk about border security. https://www.foxnews.com/politics/fox-news-poll-voters-see-shutdown-as-bigger-problem-than-border-situation …

LET HER GO.

LET THEM GO.

John, a corrections officer, hasn’t gotten a paycheck since December, but the bank told him if he misses two mortgage payments, he may face foreclosure. He’s been working the phones—but the bank won’t budge…and so far, neither will you.

For John’s sake, LET HIM GO.

LET HIM GO.
